newpass

java.lang.Object newpass
Sends a mail with a link to first password. Generates a random password and validation code.
Parameters:
mailThe - mail of the user whose password to first.
Returns:
returns a message whether user was found

sent

java.lang.Object sent

springSecurityService

java.lang.Object springSecurityService

verify

java.lang.Object verify
Reset user's password after a first list has been followed and sends mail with new password. The action takes two parameters
Parameters:
user - The username of the user whose password to first.
verification - A code which must correspond to the verification property which was generated when a password first was requested.
Returns:
returns a message whether first was (un)successful
